trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeLabelEdit"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterLabelEdit"></xref> events.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.AfterLabelEdit> event occurs when the user finishes editing the text for a tree node.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.BeforeLabelEdit> event occurs when the user begins editing the text for a tree node.
A NodeLabelEditEventArgs object specifies the new text to associate with the tree node, the tree node that contains the label to edit, and whether the edit operation has been canceled.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NodeLabelEditEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NodeLabelEditEventArgs.Node%2A> property is assigned the `node` parameter value.
The tree node containing the text to edit.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NodeLabelEditEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> and the specified text with which to update the tree node label.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NodeLabelEditEventArgs.Node%2A> property is assigned the `node` parameter value, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NodeLabelEditEventArgs.Label%2A> property is assigned the `label` parameter value.
The tree node containing the text to edit.
The new text to associate with the tree node.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the edit has been canceled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the edit has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the new text to associate with the tree node.
The value of this property is `null` if the user presses ESC to cancel the edit or presses ENTER without modifying the label text.
If the user edits the label text, the value of this property is the new label text.
This is true even if the final value of edited label text is the same as its original value.
The string value that represents the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> label or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the user cancels the edit.
Gets the tree node containing the text to edit.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the tree node containing the text to edit.
